articles.author: Kelsey Ables
articles.title: France bans iPhone 12 sales over radiation levels: Here's what to know - The Washington Post
articles.description: A French regulator said the device exposed users to radiation levels that exceed European restrictions; however, Apple says the cellphone is safe.
